nodes.text: The Third Atrisian period was a historical period on the planet Atrisia, also known as Kitel Phard. It coincided with at least a part of the Sidereal Era, a fairly peaceable era for the Galactic Republic. The reign of the 54th Atrisian emperor, Uueg Tching occurred during this era, which saw the practical unification of the planet under his rule. Uueg's Sayings were composed at this time.
